channel.title: Machine Learning on A Zero to Hero Programmer Pathway
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on A Zero to Hero Programmer Pathway

item.title: manymodelr: Build and Tune Several Models
item.description: manymodelr: Build and Tune Several Models In this vignette, we take a look at how we can simplify many machine learning tasks using manymodelr. We will take a look at the core functions first. Installing the package install.packages("manymodelr") Once the package has been successfully installed, we can then proceed by loading the package and exploring some of the key functions. Loading the package library(manymodelr) #> Loading required package: caret #> Loading required package: lattice #> Loading required package: ggplot2 #> Loading required package: Metrics #> #> Attaching package: 'Metrics' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:caret': #> #> precision, recall #> Loading required package: e1071 #> Welcome to manymodelr.
